settings.Model Response Settings Description: Saita tsoffin sigogi don amsoshin AI model. Kowane samfur yanada saiti daban.
settings.reasoningEffortDescription: Yana sarrafa zurfin tunani ga samfuran tunani. ∆òarin ∆ôo∆ôari yana samar da zurfin nazari.
settings.verbosityDescription: Yana kula da matakin cikakken bayani ga samfuran GPT-5.
settings.Controls how smoothly text appears durin: Yana kula da sassaucin bayyanar rubutu yayin amsar AI
settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Ka tabbata kana so ka sake dukan saituna? Wannan zai dawo da kima na asali ga zafin aiki, jigo, da sauran zabuka. Hira, fa…óakarwa da halaye ba zasu canza ba.
settings.storageAlmostFull: Ajiya kusan cika! Yi la‚Äôakari da gogewa hirarraki tsofaffi.
settings.backupDescription: Kirkiri cikakken ajiyar bayanai da suka hada da hirarraki, fa…óakarwa, halaye, fayiloli, da saituna.
settings.clearDataWarning: Goge duk tarihin hirarraki daga cikin ajiya na na'ura. Ba za a iya dawowa da shi ba.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Hada fa…óakarwarka, halaye, fayiloli, da wakilan musamman cikin fayil wanda membobin ∆ôungiya za su iya shigo da su.
settings.Display Name Description: Za…ìi yadda sunanka zai bayyana a gaisuwa da cikin manhajar
settings.Custom Display Name Placeholder: Shigar da sunan da kafi so
settings.displayNameUIOnly: Wannan yana sarrafa yadda sunanka zai bayyana a cikin manhaja. AI ba za ta ga wannan ba sai idan ka kunna rabawa a Saitunan Tattaunawa.
settings.howShouldWeAddressYou: Ta yaya kake so mu kira ka?
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Skan wannan lambar QR da na'urarka don fara aikin shigarwa
settings.Why Install?: Me ya sa za a Shigar?
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Shiga manhajar kai tsaye daga allon gida
settings.Works offline with cached conversations: Yana aiki ba tare da intanet ba tare da tattaunawar da aka ajiye
settings.PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Dole ne ka yi amfani da burauzar Safari a iOS - Chrome da sauran burauzori ba su goyi bayan shigar da web app a iOS ba.
settings.PWA Install Tip: üí° Shawara: Da zarar ka shigar, zaka iya bude manhajar daga allon gidanka kamar kowanne manhaja ‚Äì ba lallai sai ka shiga ta burauza ba!
settings.PWA Note: Lura: Wannan Progressive Web App (PWA) ce. Ana shigar da ita kamar manhaja ta asali amma tana amfani da fasahar burauzarka. Duk bayananka suna nan lafiya kuma amintattu a na'urarka.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Kara karantawa game da Progressive Web Apps
settings.FAQs, privacy policy, and guides: Tambayoyi masu yawan fito, tsare sirri, da jagorori
settings.Delete legacy data after migration: Goge tsoffin bayanai bayan canja wuri
settings.legacyDataDescription: Kana da {size} na bayanai daga tsohuwar sigar. Ana iya canja wuri, fitarwa, ko gogewa domin saki sarari.
settings.legacyDeleteSuccess: An goge tsoffin bayanai cikin nasara kuma an sako {size}.
settings.legacyDeleteError: An kasa gogewa tsoffin bayanai. Don Allah, gwada sake yin kokari.
settings.deleteLegacyConfirm: Ka tabbatar kana son gogewa duk tsoffin bayanai? Wannan mataki ba za a iya juyawa ba.

aboutYou.title: Game da Kai
aboutYou.shareBasicInfoDescription: Idan aka kunna, AI zai san sunanka, mukaminka, da sashen da kake daga bayanin ka
aboutYou.preferredName: Sunan da kake so a kira ka da shi
aboutYou.preferredNamePlaceholder: Yaya kake so a kira ka?
aboutYou.preferredNameDescription: Sauya sunan da ake nuna maka. Barshi a fili idan kana so a yi amfani da sunan bayaninka
aboutYou.preferredNameDescriptionWithSync: Yadda AI zai kira ka. Barshi a fili idan kana so a yi amfani da sunan da ake nuna daga Saitunan Gaba…óaya.
aboutYou.additionalContextPlaceholder: Misali, ina aiki a fannin ayyuka, ina son amsoshi masu ta∆ôaice, sau da dama ina tambaya game da ∆ôa‚Äôidojin kiwon lafiya...
aboutYou.additionalContextDescription: Duk wata kariyar bayani da kake so AI ya sani game da kai

tts.title: Rubutu-zuwa-Sauti
tts.qualityDescription: Inganci mafi girma yana samar da sauti mai kyau amma yana cinye karin bandwidth
tts.previewText: Wannan dubawa ce ta saitin sautin da aka za…ìa.
tts.noVoicesAvailable: Babu muryoyi da ake da su don wannan harshe

emptyState.changeDisplayName: Danna domin canza yadda muke kiran ka

createDiagrams.title: Kirkiri Zane-zane
createDiagrams.prompt: Nuna min yadda zaka iya kirkirar zane-zane da taswirar aiki. Wane irin hanyoyi ko tsarin aiki zaka iya taimaka min in gani? Ka ba ni misalai.

draftContent.title: Samar da Rubuce-rubuce na Sana'a
draftContent.prompt: Ina bu∆ôatar taimako wajen rubuta takardun sana'a ‚Äì imel, rahotanni, takaitattu. Za ka iya nuna misalai yadda za ka iya taimaka da nau'ikan rubutun kasuwanci daban-daban?

analyzeInformation.title: Binciki Bayanai
analyzeInformation.prompt: Ta yaya za ka taimaka mini wajen nazarin bayanai ko bayani? Nuna mani hanyoyi daban-daban da za ka iya warware lambobi, gano tsarin al'amura, ko fitar da muhimman abubuwa daga takardu ko bayanan da aka tara.

planOrganize.title: Shiryawa & Tsara
planOrganize.prompt: Za ka iya taimaka mini wajen tsara ayyuka ko tsara aiki? Ka ba ni misalan yadda za ka iya kirkirar jadawali, tsare-tsare, ko shirin aiki da tsari mabambanta.

brainstormIdeas.title: Tattara Ra'ayoyi
brainstormIdeas.prompt: Ina son neman mafita ga wata matsala. Nuna mini yadda kake tattaunawa don samar da sababbin ra'ayoyi‚Äîwace irin tambaya zaka yi kuma yaya kake binciko hanyoyin mafita?

buildPresentations.title: Gina Gabatarwa
buildPresentations.prompt: Ta yaya zaka iya taimaka mini wajen kirkirar gabatarwa? Nuna mini misalai na tsari daban-daban na gabatarwa, shawarwarin gani, da yadda kake tsara bayanai don masu sauraro daban-daban.

workWithCode.title: Aiki da Code
workWithCode.prompt: Za ka iya taimakawa da rubuta code ko scripts? Nuna mani misalai‚Äîko rubuta sabon code ne, gyara matsaloli, ko bayanin yadda abu ke aiki mataki-mataki.

decisionSupport.title: Tallafa Yanke Shawara
decisionSupport.prompt: Ina bukatar yanke shawara amma ban san yadda zan tantance zabuka ba. Za ka iya nuna mini tsarin yanke shawara ko hanyoyin da kake amfani da su don taimakawa tunani?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Takaita & Hada Bayani
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: Ta yaya kake taimakawa wajen takaita dogayen takardu ko hada bayanai daga majiyoyi daban-daban? Nuna mini misalai da tsare-tsaren takaituwa da matakan daki-daki.

explainTopics.title: Bayyana Batutuwa Masu Wahala
explainTopics.prompt: Za ka iya bayani kan abubuwa masu rikitarwa a saukake? Nuna mini yadda kake warware ra'ayi mai rikitarwa, amfani da misalai na kamance, da gyara bayani ga matakan ilimi mabambanta.

createSchedules.title: Kirkirar Jadawali
createSchedules.prompt: Ina bukatar taimako wajen tsara lokaci da yin jadawali. Nuna mini hanyoyi daban-daban da zaka iya kirkira jadawalin aiki, kalanda, ko shirin lokaci, tare da misalai.

agents.description: Kirkira da sarrafa wakilan AI na musamman da ke da kwarewa ta musamman. Wadannan wakilan suna aiki a MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance.
agents.advancedFeatureTitle: Fasaha Mai Zurfi - Bukatar Tsararren Daidaitawa da Masu Fasahar AI Assistant
agents.advancedFeatureWarning: Wakilai na musamman suna aiki ne kawai tare da MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance. Dole ne a kirkiri Agent IDs ta tawagar fasahar AI Assistant a wannan wurin sannan a daidaita da kai kafin amfani.
agents.noAgentsDescription: Kirkiri wakilinka na farko na musamman don kara wa AI kwarewa da kayan aiki ko halaye na musamman.

advancedOptions.title: Za…ìu…ì…ìuka Masu Zurfi
advancedOptions.fixedTemperatureNote: Lura: Wannan tsari yana amfani da ∆ôimar temperature mai …óorewa don samun tsayayyen aiki.

searchMode.title: Yanayin Bincike
searchMode.subtitle: Za a yi amfani da binciken yanar gizo jika an bu∆ôata
searchMode.privacyFocusedDescription: A hankali amma da tsare sirri sosai
searchMode.azureAgentModeDescription: Mai sauri amma yana ajiye bayanan hira a girgije
searchMode.privacyInfoDescription: Dukkanin hirarka za ta tafi zuwa Azure AI Foundry agent.
searchMode.learnMoreDataStorage: Kara karantawa game da ajiyar bayanai
searchMode.privacyEnabled: Bincike mai tsare sirri an kunna

customAgent.label: Agen na musamman:
customAgent.description: Wannan agen yana aiki a kan tsarin MSF AI Assistant Foundry tare da kayan aiki masu kunna koyaushe.
customAgent.webSearch: Bincike na yanar gizo kai tsaye

knowledgeCutoff.realtime: Bincike na yanar gizo kai tsaye

modelTypeIcons.foundational: Samfurin gaggawa da nagartacce don kowane irin aiki
modelTypeIcons.reasoning: Karin damar nazari don matsaloli masu wahala
modelTypeIcons.omni: Samfurin multi-modal mai fadi da yawa fasali
modelTypeIcons.agent: Agen mai kayan aiki kai tsaye & damar yanar gizo

orderMode.label: Tsara da
orderMode.name: Suna (A-Z)
orderMode.resetTooltip: Sake daidaita zuwa tsarin da aka saba

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: Samfurin AI mai amfani da GPT-4.1 tare da bincike kai tsaye ta Bing. Yana samar da bayanai na zamani, duba gaskiya, da sanarwa kan abubuwan da ke faruwa yanzu. Mafi dacewa don bincike da ke bukatar bayanai na kwanan nan, nazarin labarai, da tabbatar da gaskiya.
gpt_4_1.knowledgeCutoff: Bincike na yanar gizo kai tsaye

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: Samfurin OpenAI mafi cigaba, musamman wajen warware matsaloli masu tsauri, samar da lamba, da warware matsaloli masu fasaha. Mafi dacewa don ayyukan nazari, kalubalen shirye-shiryen kwamfuta, bincike, da bayani dalla-dalla. Yana ba da damar daidaita kokarin nazari da tsawon amsa.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Nau'in GPT-5 mai sauri da araha, daidaitacce don gudu yayin da yake kiyaye inganci. Dace da ayyukan yau da kullum, tambayoyi masu sauri, rarraba kayan aiki, da aikace-aikacen da ke bukatar amsa cikin gaggawa. Kyakkyawan daidaito tsakanin aiki da tsada.

gpt_5_2_chat.name: GPT-5.2 Chat
gpt_5_2_chat.description: Nau'in na musamman na GPT-5.2 da aka daidaita don mu'amala da mutane da fahimtar motsin rai. Mabudi wajen sadarwa da nuna tausayi, tallafin lafiyar kwakwalwa, rubuce-rubuce masu kirkira, hada-mana da tattaunawa ta dabi'a. Dace da hirarraki na yau da kullum, shawarwari, da ayyukan da ke bukatar fahimtar motsin rai.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: Samfurin OpenAI mai kwarewa wajen warware matsaloli da ban mamaki. Yafi karfi a fannin lissafi mai wahala, nazarin kimiyya, kalubalen lamba, da ayyuka masu matakai da yawa. Yana goyon bayan window na bayanai har 200K. Kuma yana ba da damar sarrafa kokarin nazari.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Samfurin Meta mai sauri kuma mai araha. Ya dace da ayyukan yau da kullum irin su rubutu, ta∆ôaitawa, da taimako a lamba mai sauki. Kyakkyawan daidaito tsakanin gudu da inganci don aikace-aikace na yau da kullum.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Masanin nazari wanda ke bayyana mataki-mataki. Mafi dacewa don matsalolin lissafi, wasan kwaikwayo na hankali, da fahimtar sabgogi masu sarkakiya. Duba yadda yake warware matsala kai tsaye.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Samfuri mai inganci musamman wajen lamba da rubuce-rubucen fasaha. Dace da warware matsalolin lamba, rubuta bayanan aiki, da bayani game da fasaha. Sauri kuma abin dogaro don aikin ci gaba.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Samfurin xAI mai sauyawa, sananne da amsoshi masu zurfi. Yana da kyau don tattaunawa maras iyaka, ayyukan ∆ôir∆ôira, da magance matsaloli masu rikitarwa.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Mafi ∆ôwazo daga samfurorin Anthropic, mai ∆ôwarewa sosai wajen tunani, coding, da ∆ôir∆ôira. Mafi dacewa don nazari mai rikitarwa, bincike, da ayyukan da ke bu∆ôatar fahimta mai zurfi.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Samfurin Claude mai daidaito, mai kyakkyawan aiki a duk coding, nazari, da ayyukan ∆ôir∆ôira. Ya dace sosai don amfani na yau da kullum tare da saurin amsawa.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Tsararren samfurin Claude Opus na baya. Ya dace sosai don ayyukan coding masu rikitarwa, nazari na daki-daki, da fahimta mai zurfi.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Samfurin Claude mai sauri da araha, an tsara shi domin ayyuka masu sau∆ôi. Ya dace sosai don tambayoyi ∆ôanana, ta∆ôaitawa, da aikace-aikace masu yawa.

searchMode.title: Bayani Kan Yanayin Bincike
searchMode.subtitle: Fahimtar za…ìu…ì…ìukan binciken ku da inda bayananku ke ajiye
searchMode.fullConversationStored: An ajiye cikakken tattaunawa a cikin Cloud
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Mafi saurin amsoshi ba tare da fasalin bincike na intanet ba. Cikakken tattaunawarku tana cikin burauzarku kawai ‚Äì ba a adana komai a cloud.
searchMode.viewDetailsBelow: Don ∆ôarin bayani, duba tsarin fasaha a ∆ôasa.
searchMode.legendNoSearch: Burauzan ku (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure OpenAI (stateless)
searchMode.privacyDescription: Yana amfani da binciken intanet idan an bu∆ôata amma yana …óaukan lokaci saboda ∆ôarin matakai. Tambayoyin bincike kawai ake ajiye a Azure ‚Äì cikakken tattaunawarku tana nan cikin burauzarku.
searchMode.legendPrivacy: Burauzan ku (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure AI Foundry (tambayoyin bincike kawai) | Azure OpenAI (stateless)
searchMode.foundryDescription: Amsa mai sauri tare da ha…óin bincike na intanet. Cikakken tattaunawa ana ajiye ta a cikin bayanan Azure AI Foundry, ba kawai a burauzarku ba.
searchMode.legendFoundry: Burauzan ku (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure AI Foundry Agent (yana adana cikakken tattaunawa)
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: Wa…óannan su ne za…ìu…ì…ìukan bincike da ake da su bayan Azure ta …óaina Bing Search API, wanda AI Assistant ya dogara da shi a baya.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: ∆òungiyar tana ci gaba da binciken hanyoyin bincike masu kare sirri. Duk za…ìu…ì…ìuka na yanzu suna amfani da damar binciken Azure AI Foundry amma sun bambanta kan yadda ake raba bayanan tattaunawa.
searchMode.azureDeprecatedBingApi: Azure sun daina amfani da Bing Search API nasu
searchMode.footerNote: Duka hanyoyin suna adana tattaunawarka a cikin burauzarka. Za ka iya sauya hanyoyi a kowane lokaci cikin saitunan samfur.

dropdown.searchTooltip:
kunna binciken yanar gizo ga kowane sa∆ôo.

Yana kawo bayanai na zamani ta amfani da Bing a ainihin lokaci.
dropdown.attachTooltip:
Manna fayiloli, hotuna, ko sauti/bidi'o'i.

Nau'in fayilolin da ake goyon baya:
‚Ä¢ Hotuna: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (5MB max, har zuwa 10)
‚Ä¢ Takardu: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, MD (10MB max, har zuwa 3)
‚Ä¢ Bayanai: CSV, JSON, XML, YAML (10MB max, har zuwa 3)
‚Ä¢ Lamba: PY, JS, TS, JAVA, C, CPP, GO, da sauransu (10MB max, har zuwa 3)
‚Ä¢ Sauti/Bidi'o'i: MP3, WAV, MP4, WebM (25MB max, fayil 1)

Jimla: Fayiloli 10, 50MB max
dropdown.transcribeTooltip:
Dora fayilolin sauti ko bidiyo don fassara zuwa rubutu.

Nau'in da ake goyon baya: MP3, MP4, WAV, WebM, M4A, MPEG, MPGA
Girman mafi yawa: 25MB

Fassarar rubutu tana faruwa kai tsaye idan ka tura sa∆ôon.
dropdown.useDefaultStyle: Yi amfani da salon rubutu na asali
dropdown.translateDocumentTooltip:
Fassara takardu zuwa wata harshe.

Nau'in da ake goyon baya: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, HTML, TXT
Mafi girman fayil: 40MB

Yana tallafawa harsuna 80+ da misalin fayilolin ∆ôamus.
